posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: June 29, 2016 at 9:58 PM#6well, Parking is Parking, which locks a DMX-channel to a fixed value.parking a fixture or an attribute is merely a shortcut to "park the DMX-channels affect by this fixture/attribute"(e.g you cannot park a virtual dimmer, as it has no dmx-channel)a DMX-channel does not have any effect or value layer, the DMX-channel is a combination of value/effect-layers, masters and DMX-profiles.
